snippet: A trade foray into Pakistan showed the foreign policy role of India’s private sector, which the government relies on to serve as an intermediary.
abstract: Trade has become the most promising opening in the latest round of diplomacy between India and Pakistan; Indian trade delegation's foray into Pakistan is proof of the increasingly important role of India’s private sector in foreign policy; India's two leading business groups have offices around the world and sponsor informal diplomatic dialogues between India and other countries (Series: India's Way)

byline.contributor: Nikhila Gill contributed research from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: A trade foray into Pakistan showed the foreign policy role of India’s private sector, which the government relies on to serve as an intermediary.

headline.print_headline: India’s Industry Helps Open Door to World
headline.seo: India’s Industry Helps Open Door to World
headline.main: Industry in India Helps Open a Door to the World
